original_title: Keheliya, ex-Health Secretary and 5 others further remanded
original_body_lines: Former Minister of Health Keheliya Rambukwella, former Health Secretary Janaka Chandragupta and five others have been ordered to be further remanded until February 29, over the import of substandard human Immunoglobulin vials.
This order was issued when the case was taken up before the Maligakanda Magistrate’s Court today (15), Ada Derana reporter said.
